name: Screen Pan

outputs.name: Next
outputs.description: Execute the next node when finger is moving on the device screen

outputs.name: Offset
outputs.description: The distance between the start position and the moving position of the finger on the device screen

outputs.name: Position
outputs.description: The 2D position of the finger on the device screen

description: Execute the next node when someone moves their finger on the device screen over 30 pixels.
